name: Atoms Match
description:
Atoms Match brings you all new mind puzzle logic challenge. Connect atoms to build molecules and do it as fast as possible before running out of atoms. This is a unique connect puzzle match game that will challenge your brain in a completely new way. Definitely something different from what you are accustomed to see in the brain teaser match it puzzles.

 

⚛️EXQUISITE PUZZLE GAMING

Atoms Match brings you 118 levels of impeccable logic puzzle gaming in which you need to connect atoms to build molecules. The key is to place them on game area in a way that there are no free connections left. The great thing about Atoms Match is that while matching and building you can learn more about atoms. How? Just tap its name during game play to get basic information about that particular atom.

 

▪️ EXCITING BRAIN TEASER

The atoms with different connections are appearing at the bottom. The tricky part about this brain teaser puzzler is that you don’t have much time to think, which is especially needed in the harder levels. The line where the atoms are appearing can’t be full or you will lose the game. Thus you must think sharp and fast to finish the levels. This makes Atoms Match one of the most enjoyable, but at the same time excitingly challenging logic puzzles!

 

💡Atoms Match Features:

✅ game offers 118 challenging levels

✅ expand your knowledge with info about every atom

✅ simple and toned graphic

✅ mind logic connect puzzle game

✅ exquisite soundtrack & sound effects

✅ free brain teaser puzzle game

---------------

We are sure you will love to play it more and more each day as it truly challenges the brain and features an addictive gameplay.

Download for FREE and be sure that you are playing one of the best match it logic puzzles of the year!
